## Problem 1

```{r}
files = list.files("./data", pattern = "*.csv", full.names = TRUE)

participant_data = files %>% 
  map(~read_csv(file.path(".", .))) %>% 
  reduce(rbind)

for (i in 1:20) {
  if (i <11) {
   participant_data[[i]] = participant_data[[i]] %>% 
     mutate_at(arm = "Control", study_id = i)
   }
  if (i >10) {
    participant_data[[i]] = participant_data[[i]] %>% 
      mutate_at(arm = "Experiment", study_id = i)
    }
  }
```
